name: gloogle
description: Gloogle, the best tech empire ever

scripts.install:services: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd gloogle-docs && npm install" "cd gloogle-mail && npm install" "cd gloogle-calendar && npm install"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:docs" "npm run start:mail" "npm run start:calendar" "npm run start:auth"

author: Darko Bozhinovski
